title: ঘরে বসে Spoken English
author: Munzereen Shahid
body: Learn how to speak English fluently and be a confident English speaker in your everyday life. It is a complete Spoken English course for beginners.

title: চাকরিজীবীদের জন্য English
author: Munzereen Shahid
body: Learn both written and spoken English for getting ahead in professional spheres. An all inclusive course of effective English communication for professionals.

title: Programming for kids
author: Prapty Rahman
body: Introduce your kids to the world of programming, through the basics of HTML and CSS. Enrol them today to prepare them for the future of technology!

title: ২৪ ঘণ্টায় কোরআন শিখি
author: মুহাম্মাদ জামাল উদ্দীন
body: Learn Quran in Bangla with correct pronunciation. Enroll now to learn Quran easily in 24 hours.

title: ঘরে বসে Freelancing
author: Joyeta Banerjee
body: Learn freelancing online from the top-rated freelancing course in Bangladesh. Establish yourself in freelancing marketplaces, get your first client, build a successful portfolio, and make money online right from the comfort of your own home.

title: Data Entry দিয়ে Freelancing
author: Joyeta Banerjee
body: Learn Data Entry to get data entry jobs and start earning through freelancing. Get the best guidelines from a top-rated freelancer about Data Entry to start your career.
